jmortgage.payment.extra
Interface ExtraPmtMapBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultExtraPmtMapBuilder
public interface ExtraPmtMapBuilder

Implementation of this interface builds an extra payment map based on the PmtKey and the number of years for a mortgage term.

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Armstrong

Method Summary
 Map<Long,Double> buildExtraPmtsMap(List<ExtraPmt> extraPmts)
          Builds an extra payment Map object.
 PmtKey getPmtKey()
          Gets the PmtKey instantiation used to build the map of extra payments.
 int getYears()
          Gets the years in the mortgage term used to build the map of extra payments.
 ExtraPmtMapBuilder setPmtKey(PmtKey pmtKey)
          Sets the PmtKey instantiation.
 ExtraPmtMapBuilder setYears(int years)
          Sets the years in the mortgage for which the ExtraPmtMapBuilder instance will build a map of extra payments.
 

Method Detail

buildExtraPmtsMap

Map<Long,Double> buildExtraPmtsMap(List<ExtraPmt> extraPmts)
Builds an extra payment Map object. The map uses a Long for the key that must match exactly the date of one of the regular mortgage payments. The value of the map is an implementation of FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment. This map is used by an implemenation of FixedAmortizationBuilder to calculate the effect of the extra payments on an amortization schedule.

Parameters:
extraPmts - A List of objects that implement the ExtraPmt interface.
Returns:
Map of extra payments

getPmtKey

PmtKey getPmtKey()
Gets the PmtKey instantiation used to build the map of extra payments. The PmtKey instantiation must be the same as the one used to build the amortization table with an instantiation of FixedAmortizationBuilder to which the extra payments will apply.

Returns:
PmtKey instantiation

getYears

int getYears()
Gets the years in the mortgage term used to build the map of extra payments. The year value must be the same as the one used to build an amortization table with an instantiation of FixedAmortizationBuilder to which the extra payments will apply.

Returns:
int years value

setPmtKey

ExtraPmtMapBuilder setPmtKey(PmtKey pmtKey)
Sets the PmtKey instantiation. This method encourages immutability by returning an instance of ExtraPmtMapBuilder

Parameters:
pmtKey - PmtKey object to be used to build a map of extra payments
Returns:
ExtraPmtMapBuilder instantiation

setYears

ExtraPmtMapBuilder setYears(int years)
Sets the years in the mortgage for which the ExtraPmtMapBuilder instance will build a map of extra payments. This method encourages immutability by returning an instance of ExtraPmtMapBuilder

Parameters:
years - number of years in the mortgage
Returns:
ExtraPmtMapBuilder instantiation
